definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: secret place, hiding place;—abs. ´[[מ]] Ps 10:9, Hb Hab 3:14; usu. pl. [[מִסְתָּרִים]] Je 13:17 + 6 t.; sf. [[מִסְתָּרָיו]] Je 49:10; —
secret place(s), concealed from view, Je 13:17; where treasures are stored Is 45:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: for perpetration of crime, esp. murder: Ps 10:8 (‖[[מַאֲרָב]]), sim. of lion v:Ps 10:9, Ps 17:12, cf. Hb Hab 3:14; Ps 64:5; of ´[[י]] lying in wait La 3:10 (as a lion).
